level.heading: Construction and maintenance of asbestos containment structures and other temporary structures or work required for asbestos abatement activities.
level.text: ยง 28-106.2 Construction and maintenance of asbestos containment structures and other temporary structures or work required for asbestos abatement activities. Notwithstanding any other provision of this code, the construction and maintenance of asbestos containment structures, decontamination system enclosures and other temporary structures or work performed in the course of and only for the purpose of asbestos abatement activities shall comply with this section and the rules of the Department of Environmental Protection relating to such temporary structures and work and with Article 30 of the Labor Law and rules adopted pursuant to such article.
